key_findings: Advanced Neurocious shows spatial belief navigation capabilities
Many worlds branching provides scenario-aware risk management
Inverse flow reconstruction enables causal explanations
Uncertainty quantification outperforms traditional approaches
Realistic evaluation reveals genuine model advantages
experiment_summary.methodology_significance: First comprehensive evaluation of advanced spatial belief navigation in realistic financial settings
